Description: Aloha J-45! This brilliant spin on the J-45 combines all of attributes that made it iconic and adds beautiful flamed Koa back and sides! This is a truly remarkable limited model as this outstanding tonewood is only grown in Hawaii. Koa displays a stunning variety of flame patterns so we invite you to spend some time examining all the serial numbers involved with this limited run. The shorter scale length provides an extra boost of warmth to the overall voice as well as increased comfort under the fretting hand. The tonal presence that Koa provides in this design context allows for an instrument that simultaneously honors those tried and true Gibson characteristics, all while while forging a new path in the legacy of the J-45. We at Wildwood invite you to experience the MAJESTY of the Limited Edition J-45 Koa! Condition of Instrument Excellent condition with no play wear. Includes the original hardshell case and COA.
